short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Form filler that obtains entries from Remote Desktop Manager, Devolutions Server and Devolutions Hub
short.de: Füllt Anmeldeinformationen aus - Einträge werden von Remote Desktop Manager, Devolutions Server und Devolutions Hub abgerufen
short.es: Rellenador de formularios que obtiene entradas del Administrador de Escritorio Remoto, Devolutions Server y Devolutions Hub
short.fr: Remplisseur de formulaires qui obtient les entrées de Remote Desktop Manager, Devolutions Server et Devolutions Hub
short.it: Compilatore di moduli che ottiene voci da Remote Desktop Manager, Devolutions Server e Password Hub Business / Personal
short.nl: Formulier vuller dat items van Remote Desktop Manager of Devolutions Password server ophaalt
short.pl: Wypełniacz formularzy, który uzyskuje wpisy z Menedżera usług pulpitu zdalnego, serwera Devolutions Server i Password Hub
short.ru: Форма наполнителя, который получает записи от удаленного менеджера рабочего стола и сервера передачи
short.tr: Remote Desktop Manager, Devolutions Server ve Devolutions Hub'dan gelen girişleri elde eden form doldurucu
short.uk: Заповнювач форм, який отримує записи від Remote Desktop Manager, Devolutions Server і Devolutions Hub Business / Personal
short.zh_TW:
從 Remote Desktop Manager, Devolutions Server 和 Password Hub Business / Personal
獲取項目的表單填入工具

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
With a single click, easily sign in to your favorite websites using your secured passwords.

Workspace Browser Extension complements Devolutions Server, Devolutions Hub Business, Devolutions Hub Personal, and Remote Desktop Manager, enabling users to securely inject passwords into websites stored in their vaults.

The Devolutions Workspace browser extension provides users with a simple method of automatically connecting to websites without ever having to remember the password.

Also connected to Devolutions Hub, the extension can display all entries from your vault, enabling you to view and copy sensitive information like credit card information, contacts, and more.
long.de,es,fr,hu,it,nl,pl,ru,sv,tr,uk,zh_TW:
Easily create, store and auto-fill your login credentials and passwords to any websites directly from your web browser.
Securely create and store all your credentials - including username and password - to Remote Desktop Manager or Devolutions Server and automatically login to your websites.

Remote Desktop Manager
Remote Connections & Passwords. Everywhere!
Remote Desktop Manager lets you centralize all your remote connections, passwords and credentials into a unique platform that can be securely shared between users. Drive security, speed and productivity through your organization while reducing risks for your IT department. Join over 270,000 users in more than 125 countries who enjoy our remote connection management solution.
Available at http://remotedesktopmanager.com/

Devolutions is a leading provider of remote connection, password and credential management tools for sysadmins and IT pros.
https://devolutions.net/
